slide_type.description: Determines if a slide is set as a Waypoint or Overview. An overview is meant to describe the map as a whole. It's coordinates and zoom will determine where the map is centered on when initially displaying to the user. Only one slide can be set as the overview. Waypoints are the markers on the map. Each can be paired with a description and an image.

zoom.description: Determines how far the map zooms in on a marker when it is selected.

link.description: A link that can be provided as a "learn more" option that will lead to an additional source of information related to the slide.

link_text.description: The text that will be displayed to the user to click on. I.E. "Learn More"

url.description: A URL for a piece of media that will be displayed with the Slide. These URLs can point to images, videos, audio, etc. All Media types listed here are supported, with the exception of <iframe> and <blockquote>.

caption.description: A URL for an image to use in the timenav marker for the event. If omitted, storymap will use an icon based on the type of media. Not relevant for title slides, because they do not have a marker.

credit.description: Optional credit given to for the photo.

alt.description: A short description of the image (Required for 508 compliance).
